TopicTitle: How do I play KSP!!! I HAVE SO MANY QUESTIONS!!! And other things a new KSP Player may ask.

Articles.Content: Here is the space (pun intended COME ON ITS A SPACE GAME!) where all your questions and worries will be answered by the noble community of KSP.

This one here is for newbie questions as well as greetings, and then when you feel more confident you can mosey over to here. 

And welcome to the forum.
